attributes.action: Either Legalize Drugs and Sex in Public or Illegalize LGBT.
attributes.additional_details:
If Drugs, Sex in Public, is against the Law. Why then will LGBT be Legal, saying it's their Human Right to do and be what ever they want. People Doing all kinds of Drugs and Sex in Public should Also have their own Human Right to do and be what ever they want to be. Either Legalize Drugs and Sex in Public or Illegalize LGBT.

S.B Amada
